price: 18. Esto es lo que sucedió, y Al-lah debilita los planes de quienes rechazan la verdad.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
